SQL CIPHER 
SQLCipher is an open source library that provides transparent, secure 256-bit AES encryption of SQLite database files. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: https://www.zetetic.net/sqlcipher/license 
 
EZ-VCARD 
This library enables the import and export of industry standard vCard (.vcf) files. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause 
 
BOOTSTRAP 
Bootstrap is the front end adaptive framework that enables the SecureSuite web app to look great in all sorts of small and large web browsers. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ 
 
GLYPHICONS 
Icons are provided by GLYPHICONS.com as distributed with Bootstrap. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ 
 
MiniTemplator 
MiniTemplator is a compact template engine for HTML files written by Christian d'Heureuse, Inventec Informatik AG, Zurich, Switzerland. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html/ 
 
COMMONS CODEC 
The Apache Commons Codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: http://www.apache.org/licenses/ 
 
GUAVA Google Core Libraries 
The Guava project contains several of Google's core libraries that we rely on in our Java-based projects: collections, caching, primitives support, concurrency libraries, common annotations, string processing, I/O, and so forth. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 
 
JACKSON 
Jackson is a suite of data-processing tools for Java (and JVM platform), including the flagship JSON parsing and generation library. 
No modifications are made to this library. 
License: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
